ms. foley

i was lucky enough to be in lexington when a buddy of mine was directing a short film of his and asked if I would take some behind the scenes photos. i never pass on the opportunity to visit wilmore, kentucky, and this time was as fun and memorable as many others.

nothing like a group of old friends coming together to make an idea into a reality. it's something that you tend to lose as you get older, so this is quite the cherished memory.

shot on canon 5D mkiii
